validators.description: High performance validator committed to the Solana ecosystem.
We use high-performance infrastructure and share MEV for you to earn ultra optimized rewards.

I am an individual validator from Ukraine, I have extensive experience in Devops, I work in one of the largest banks in the country. The path to solana validators was long and difficult :). I was able to find a private data center, so I have good decentralization

Juicy Stake was founded by Knox Trades, a Systems, Networking, and Cloud Architect but even moreso, a blockchain maxi. The goal for Juicy Stake is to provide validator staking and services to consumers who want to stake their crypto on Proof of Stake Blockchains.
Software & blockchain company. We operate a leading validator on Solana
